text: Tang Yao-ming (; 29 November 1940 - 3 November 2021前國防部長湯曜明辭世 享壽84歲 ) was a Taiwanese general officer. He was the Minister of National Defense of the Republic of China (ROC) from 2002 to 2004. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Taiwanese politicians
title: Tang Yao-ming
